fields.subtitle: Agricultural Economics and Land Ownership Survey (1988) on CD-ROM

dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue:
File contains economic detail measuring financial inputs and returns to farm operators, landlords and contractors. The detail includes measures of debt level and receipts of government payments, also measures source of off farm income for farm operators' family. Data includes measures of farm land ownership for operators and operators, measures include when land was owned, acquired, and measure of lease type.

Geographic area includes all 50 states.

fields.notesText: Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: The universe is all farms. A farm is any place from which $1,000 or more of agricultural products were sold, or normally would have been sold, during the census year.; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:ACCESS.CATEGORY  Notes: I; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:CODEBOOK.NUMBER  Notes: 30-AGR-1987-ROM;
